title: Bug 117981: Unable to select any item at first attempt in library outline view
description:
Description: When using the library outline view, it is not possible to select any item on the first attempt.

Steps to Reproduce:
1. Open the library outline view.
2. Add a label to a library file.
3. Select the added label item in the library outline view.
4. Observe that the item is not selected on the first attempt.

Observed Behavior: Any item in the library outline view cannot be selected on the first attempt.

Expected Behavior: When selecting an item in the library outline view, it should be selected immediately without requiring additional attempts.
OB: Any item in the library outline view cannot be selected on the first attempt.
EB: When selecting an item in the library outline view, it should be selected immediately without requiring additional attempts.
